name: Graduation: Apocalypse
description:
Graduation: Apocalypse

Schools out, but so are the zombies running amok in the hallways and classrooms! Choose either a Jock, Cheer Leader, Nerd, or Goth to fend off the ensuing horde and put a stop to this school outbreak!

Made for a workplace game jam in 24ish hours. Plays like Vampire Survivors. Some bugs galore, and it WILL lag towards the end of the game. Might fix later at some point.

Team Fluffy Cats! 2022

Code - Shweep
Character Design / Illustrations - shiv
Pixel Art - Kat
